name: Wallend-Air CC
about: Wallend-Air CC, established in 1987 by Pete Wallenda, is the longest-standing paragliding school in South Africa. With over 30 years of experience, the school offers introduction tandem flights, comprehensive paragliding courses, and various events. Led by highly skilled and SAHPA-certified instructors, including Pete and Sue Wallenda, the school provides the safest and most comprehensive training available. Courses include the Introductory and Basic Licence programs, with a focus on ground training, safety checks, and solo flights. Wallend-Air uses prominent launch sites such as Signal Hill, Lion's Head, and the Garden Route, ensuring a unique and thrilling experience. The school is committed to service excellence and has developed its own ground training gliders, making it the premier choice for paragliding education. With a strong emphasis on safety and fun, Wallend-Air promises to transform your life through the art of paragliding.
